missing_dependencies.description: Indemnification obligations should be backed by insurance.
Data protection relies on confidentiality obligations.
IP protection depends on confidentiality of trade secrets.

power_analysis.summary: Contract appears relatively balanced between parties.

top_3_risks: MEDIUM: indemnification depends on insurance, but insurance is missing. Indemnification obligations should be backed by insurance.
MEDIUM: intellectual_property depends on confidentiality, but confidentiality is missing. IP protection depends on confidentiality of trade secrets.
MEDIUM: Expected clause 'limitation of liability' is missing. Present in 95% of similar contracts.

overall.executive_summary: Contract Risk Level: MEDIUM. 3 missing clause dependency(ies). Missing expected clauses: limitation of liability, confidentiality, force majeure. Highest dispute risk: indemnification (50% probability). Completeness: 57%.
